text: DescriptionGREAT Benefits+ ESOP program. Company contributes 7% of the employee’s total yearly income+. This Jobot Job is hosted by: Natalie Hocevar. Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume. Salary: $55, 000 - $70, 000 per year. A bit about us: This architecture firm has designed regional, neighborhood and life style retail centers and retail stores, office buildings and campuses, manufacturing facilities and warehouses, educational facilities, hotels, healthcare facilities and recreational facilities. In response to their client's needs in more recent years, we have provided design services for mixed-use projects (theaters, apartments, retail), community design and neighborhood planning, urban design, waterfront development and public open space projects. Why join us? Competitive Salary. Amazing benefits. ESOP program. 7% company contribution of total annual salary. Job Details. You will work on a broad range of development project types from mixed use development, retail and hospitality to health care and restaurant. 10. years of Interior Design. Healthcare. Hospitality experience is a major ++. Professionally accredited degree in Architecture or Interior Design. Experience with AutoCAD + Revit. Project scheduling, budgeting, and business development activities and professional mentoring. Great communication. Must be local to Wichita or willing to relocate. Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.

Description

GREAT Benefits+ ESOP program+ Company contributes 7% of the employee\u2019s total yearly income+

This Jobot Job is hosted by: Natalie Hocevar
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the \"Apply\" button and sending us your resume.
Salary: $55,000 - $70,000 per year

A bit about us:

This architecture firm has designed regional, neighborhood and life style retail centers and retail stores, office buildings and campuses, manufacturing facilities and warehouses, educational facilities, hotels, healthcare facilities and recreational facilities. In response to their client's needs in more recent years, we have provided design services for mixed-use projects (theaters, apartments, retail), community design and neighborhood planning, urban design, waterfront development and public open space projects.

Why join us?
  • Competitive Salary
  • Amazing benefits
  • ESOP program
  • 7% company contribution of total annual salary


Job Details

You will work on a broad range of development project types from mixed use development, retail and hospitality to health care and restaurant.
  • 10+ years of Interior Design
  • Healthcare + Hospitality experience is a major ++
  • Professionally accredited degree in Architecture or Interior Design.
  • Experience with AutoCAD + Revit
  • Project scheduling, budgeting, and business development activities and professional mentoring.
  • Great communication.
  • Must be local to Wichita or willing to relocate.


Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the \"Apply\" button.
